
  .. _RO_0002479:
  .. _has part that occurs in:
  .. index:: 
     single: RO_0002479; has part that occurs in
     single: has part that occurs in; RO_0002479

RO_0002479 - has part that occurs in
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for has part that occurs in

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    p has part that occurs in c if and only if there exists some p1, such that p has_part p1, and p1 occurs in c.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
